I keep getting lost on expeditions
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): I keep getting lost on expeditions
By Sandy on Monday, March 31, 2003 - 11:36 am:

Is there some secret to NOT being lost? Every single time I go to Promiass I get lost, and most of the time in Malkt. I had an INT over 650. Do I need an INT of 900+ to make it in Promiass?

It's highly irritating when I've managed to collect a bunch of goodies in some ruin site and then my idiot monster gets lost so I lose everything. Argh. What am I doing wrong?

By Infernus on Monday, March 31, 2003 - 02:25 pm:

No secret, 900+ INT doesn't help either, from what I've found at least. It's pretty random I think, you just have know when to back out, in other words don't get greedy.

By GoldenBoy on Monday, March 31, 2003 - 07:15 pm:

Smarter monsters, having the Observer trait, and moving from building to building are the things I do to lessen my chances of getting lost.

By Sandy on Tuesday, April 1, 2003 - 08:42 am:

well I rarely get lost on the first exploration of a given building it's true. It seems to have nothing to do with my monster's level, that's for sure. My 650 INT dragon who'd beaten the Emperor's Cup got lost every time.

But I seem to recall at least one monster that was able to search again and again without getting lost. Maybe it was just because I was in Tapota and that's easier?

By GoldenBoy on Tuesday, April 1, 2003 - 06:15 pm:

Some non verifiable suspicions I have that I didn't post originally are:

Ruins: The higher the rank for the ruin the easier it is to get lost.

Breed: certain breeds tend to get lost more often.

I am hesitant to mention these because there are no hard facts to back it up, and I'm not motivated enough to do the extensive testing needed.

By Kurasu Soratobu on Tuesday, April 1, 2003 - 08:22 pm:

I've got another suspicion to add here:

Certain buildings: My SO made comments on this. There were certain buildings that he would get lost in more often than others. He complains about these 'cursed buildings'. This may just be his own personal luck, though. I haven't been keeping an eye on it, but I do have to confirm that some buildings seem to eat my monsters more than others.

By Moonmonster on Wednesday, April 2, 2003 - 01:36 pm:

Theory: The more you yourself visit the place, the less chance it will get lost. Also Observer could help too, as it finds an item instead of getting lost.

By Seize on Friday, April 4, 2003 - 03:28 pm:

In the "Temporary thread to complete maps" I mentioned a ruin were I ALWAYS got lost or fought a stray.
